author: Nikhil Sharma
title: Katrina Kaif, Vicky Kaushal share sweets with media persons after wedding.
description: Vicky Kaushal and Katrina Kaif’s wedding took everybody by surprise and has created a lot of buzz in the last few days. Though the couple is yet to confirm if they are really tying the knot, rumours are rife that Vicky and Katrina will exchange wedding vows today on December 9, this year. As per various reports and information provided, the duo has planned an extravagant wedding in Rajasthan’s exotic fort. While their fans are waiting with bated breath for official confirmation and pictures, many are wondering how did love blossom between the two.

author: Shubhangi Gupta
title: Delhi reports second case of Omicron variant; tally in India rises to 33
description:
So far, Omicron cases have been detected in Maharashtra, which has the highest, Gujarat, Rajasthan, Karnataka and Delhi.
Delhi has reported its second case of Omicron after a fully vaccinated individual with a travel history to Zimbabwe and South Africa tested positive for the new variant of the coronavirus deemed to be more dangerous and transmissible than the previous strains.

author: Rezaul H Laskar
title: India’s move to send medicines for Afghan kids draws praise from Taliban
description:
Taliban deputy spokesperson Ahmadullah Wasiq tweeted in Pashto that important medical equipment would also be brought in from India and made available to hospitals.
The medicines sent by India will be handed over to the representatives of the World Health Organization (WHO) in Kabul and will be administered at the Indira Gandhi Children’s Hospital located in the capital city. (AFP PHOTO.)

author: Hindustan Times
title: Terrorists open fire at police bus on Srinagar outskirts, 2 cops die, 12 hurt
description:
The attack on the police bus carrying armed personnel happened near Zewan in the Pantha Chowk area on the outskirts of the city.
At least 14 police personnel were injured on Monday after terrorists opened fire on a bus they were travelling in Jammu and Kashmir's Srinagar.

author: Prakash Yadav
title: Omicron in India LIVE Updates | Himachal Pradesh, MP report first Omicron cases
description: Omicron cases in India: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday announced "precautionary doses", or booster dose of Covid-19 vaccine, for healthcare and frontline workers and people above 60 years of age with co-morbidities from January 10. PM Modi also announced vaccination for 15-18 year age group against Covid-19 from January 3. PM Modi's address came in the wake of the rising cases of the Omicron variant in India. On Sunday morning, the Omicron case tally in India rose to 422, with Maharashtra recording 108 cases of the new variant. Follow this blog for latest updates
